genders.name: Male
genders.description: Identifies as a man or boy.

genders.name: Female
genders.description: Identifies as a woman or girl.

genders.name: Apache Attack Helicopter
genders.description: A humorous or satirical term sometimes used online as a commentary on the complexity of gender identity.

genders.name: Non-Binary
genders.description: Identifies outside the traditional gender binary.

genders.name: Genderqueer
genders.description: A gender identity that rejects conventional categories.

genders.name: Agender
genders.description: Lacks a gender identity or considers it irrelevant.

genders.name: Bigender
genders.description: Identifies as two genders, either simultaneously or switching between them.

genders.name: Demiboy
genders.description: Partially, but not wholly, identifies as a man or boy.

genders.name: Demigirl
genders.description: Partially, but not wholly, identifies as a woman or girl.

genders.name: Genderfluid
genders.description: Gender identity that may change over time or in different situations.

genders.name: Androgynous
genders.description: Identifies as having a gender that is a mix of both male and female.

genders.name: Two-Spirit
genders.description: An indigenous term representing a person embodying both masculine and feminine qualities.
